mysticmod:AcidSplash.NAME: Acid Splash
mysticmod:AcidSplash.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Alacrity.NAME: Alacrity
mysticmod:Alacrity.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: gain [E] next turn.

mysticmod:AllIn.NAME: All In
mysticmod:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Become Weak for !M! turns.

mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.NAME: Arcane Accuracy
mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Spell during your turn, gain one Strength until end of turn.
mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Spell during your turn, gain one Strength until end of turn.

mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.NAME: Arcane Dodge
mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Arcane: gain an additional !M! Block.

mysticmod:BladeBurst.NAME: Blade Burst
mysticmod:BladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Lose 1 Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a Magic Weapon to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:BladeBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Lose 1 Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a Magic Weapon+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:BladeMaster.NAME: Blade Master
mysticmod:BladeMaster.DESCRIPTION: Return a Technique from your discard pile to your hand.
mysticmod:BladeMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return up to two Techniques from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:BladedDash.NAME: Bladed Dash
mysticmod:BladedDash.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. Arcane: Gain !B! Block.

mysticmod:ChargedParry.NAME: Charged Parry
mysticmod:ChargedParry.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Arcane: Gain !M! Strength this turn.

mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to !M! times the total number of Spells and Techniques played this turn X times.

mysticmod:ComboCaster.NAME: Combo Caster
mysticmod:ComboCaster.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Cantrip to your hand.

mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.NAME: Components Pouch
mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Spell in your hand.

mysticmod:CureLightWounds.NAME: Cure Light Wounds
mysticmod:CureLightWounds.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Daze.NAME: Daze
mysticmod:Daze.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Technical: apply !M! Vulnerable.

mysticmod:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
mysticmod:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Begin each turn as if you had already played one Spell and one Technique.

mysticmod:Disintegrate.NAME: Disintegrate
mysticmod:Disintegrate.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores armor.

mysticmod:DiviningBlow.NAME: Divining Blow
mysticmod:DiviningBlow.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: draw !M! cards.

mysticmod:Doublecast.NAME: Doublecast
mysticmod:Doublecast.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Spell is played twice.
mysticmod:Doublecast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next two Spells are played twice.

mysticmod:EarthenWall.NAME: Earthen Wall
mysticmod:EarthenWall.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.NAME: Ebb and Flow
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, Draw 1 card, then discard 2 cards unless you have both a Spell and Technique in your hand.
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, Draw 1 card, then discard 2 cards unless you have both a Spell and Technique in your hand.

mysticmod:EnergizedRift.NAME: Energized Rift
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Add a random Cantrip to your hand, then duplicate all Cantrips in your hand. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Add a random upgraded Cantrip to your hand, then duplicate all Cantrips in your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Feint.NAME: Feint
mysticmod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. Add a random Cantrip to your hand.
mysticmod:Feint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. Add a random upgraded Cantrip to your hand.

mysticmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
mysticmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Deal !D! damage. Technical: deal it to all enemies.

mysticmod:FiveFootStep.NAME: 5 Foot Step
mysticmod:FiveFootStep.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

mysticmod:FloatingDisk.NAME: Floating Disk
mysticmod:FloatingDisk.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: gain !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

mysticmod:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmod:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less per Spell or Technique played. NL Deal !D! damage twice, then double the Spell and Technique count.

mysticmod:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
mysticmod:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Arcane: !B! times instead

mysticmod:GeminiForm.NAME: Gemini Form
mysticmod:GeminiForm.DESCRIPTION: The first skill or attack you play each turn counts as both a Spell and a Technique.

mysticmod:Grapple.NAME: Grapple
mysticmod:Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Target loses 20 Strength this turn. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Grapple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Target loses 20 Strength this turn. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

mysticmod:Grease.NAME: Grease
mysticmod:Grease.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Technical: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn instead.

mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.NAME: Greater Invisibility
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.DESCRIPTION: Spell. Gain 1 Intangible. NL If you did not play !M! Techniques this turn, Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spell. Gain 1 Intangible. NL If you did not play a Technique this turn, Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.NAME: Illusion Of Calm
mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Become Frail for !M! turns.

mysticmod:Haste.NAME: Haste
mysticmod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Spell. Gain [E] and Draw 1 card each turn. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spell. Gain [E] and Draw 1 card each turn. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:HeavyStrike.NAME: Heavy Strike
mysticmod:HeavyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! vulnerable.

mysticmod:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
mysticmod:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Technique. Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

mysticmod:KeenEdge.NAME: Keen Edge
mysticmod:KeenEdge.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Apply 10 Vulnerable to all enemies.

mysticmod:KnowledgePool.NAME: Knowledge Pool
mysticmod:KnowledgePool.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of 3 random Spell cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
mysticmod:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Technical: Deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
mysticmod:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 2 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. Feat.
mysticmod:Lunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 2 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. Feat.

mysticmod:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
mysticmod:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Deal !D! damage for each time the deck was shuffled this combat.

mysticmod:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain 1 Strength. Add a Blade Burst to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain 1 Strength. Add a Blade Burst+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:MightyMagic.NAME: Mighty Magic
mysticmod:MightyMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Technique during your turn, gain one Dexterity until end of turn.
mysticmod:MightyMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Technique during your turn, gain one Dexterity until end of turn.

mysticmod:MirrorEntity.NAME: Mirror Entity
mysticmod:MirrorEntity.DESCRIPTION: Spells and Techniques also advance next turn's Spells and Techniques counter.

mysticmod:MirrorStrike.NAME: Mirror Strike
mysticmod:MirrorStrike.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. For every two spells played this turn, deal an additional !D! damage.

mysticmod:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
mysticmod:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Spells and techniques deal 1 more damage and gain 1 more Block for each card of the other type played this turn

mysticmod:Moulinet.NAME: Moulinet
mysticmod:Moulinet.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

mysticmod:MysticalShield.NAME: Mystical Shield
mysticmod:MysticalShield.DESCRIPTION: Block is reduced to 10 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.
mysticmod:MysticalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is set to 10 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

mysticmod:Natural20.NAME: Natural 20
mysticmod:Natural20.DESCRIPTION: Technique. Your next Attack this turn does double damage. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Natural20.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. Your next Attack this turn does double damage.

mysticmod:ObscuringMist.NAME: Obscuring Mist
mysticmod:ObscuringMist.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PowerAttack.NAME: Power Attack
mysticmod:PowerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain 6 Strength and lose !M! Dexterity this turn. NL Feat.

mysticmod:PreparedCaster.NAME: Prepared Caster
mysticmod:PreparedCaster.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose one Spell from your draw pile and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
mysticmod:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:PunishingArmor.NAME: Punishing Armor
mysticmod:PunishingArmor.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PureInstinct.NAME: Pure Instinct
mysticmod:PureInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Technique in your hand.

mysticmod:RapidCaster.NAME: Rapid Caster
mysticmod:RapidCaster.DESCRIPTION: The first Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.
mysticmod:RapidCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. The first Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.

mysticmod:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray Of Frost
mysticmod:RayOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
mysticmod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL if the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable.

mysticmod:SpellCombat.NAME: Spell Combat
mysticmod:SpellCombat.DESCRIPTION: Arcane: deal !D! damage X times. NL Technical: Gain !B! Block X times.

mysticmod:SpellRecall.NAME: Spell Recall
mysticmod:SpellRecall.DESCRIPTION: Return a Spell from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:SpellRecall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a Spell from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:Shield.NAME: Shield
mysticmod:Shield.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

mysticmod:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
mysticmod:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Deal !D! damage. Technical: deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Sideswipe.NAME: Sideswipe
mysticmod:Sideswipe.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: Apply !M! weak.

mysticmod:Spark.NAME: Spark
mysticmod:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Gain [E]. Draw a card. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Gain [E]. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Spellstrike.NAME: Spellstrike
mysticmod:Spellstrike.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL search your draw pile for an Attack Spell and play it. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.NAME: Spontaneous Caster
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Spell, exhaust it and add a random Spell to your discard pile.
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Spell, exhaust it and add a random Spell to your discard pile.

mysticmod:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
mysticmod:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Spell. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Block at the start of the next !M! turns.

mysticmod:StyleChange.NAME: Style Change
mysticmod:StyleChange.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Technique to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:SuddenClarity.NAME: Sudden Clarity
mysticmod:SuddenClarity.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card
mysticmod:SuddenClarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards

mysticmod:TomeOfSpells.NAME: Tome Of Spells
mysticmod:TomeOfSpells.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Cantrips to your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:VorpalThrust.NAME: Vorpal Thrust
mysticmod:VorpalThrust.DESCRIPTION: Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. If you played two Spells this turn, deal !M! damage instead.
